amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 118-30 to require a study on streamlining the regulatory approval timeline by examining certain licensing/permitting processes for other sources of energy under the jurisdiction of the Department of Energy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Donalds amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Donalds.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Donalds amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
